description.english: In Season 2, only defeat enemies while in Mech form

description.english: In Season 2 or higher, complete a Mission without collecting any Salvage
description.german: Beende eine Mission in Phase 2 oder höher, ohne Altmaterial einzusammeln
description.french: À partir de la saison 2, terminer une mission sans collecter de métaux de recyclage

displayName.japanese: センチメンタル・センチネル

description.english: Kill a Sentinel within one second of alerting it
description.german: Töte einen unbeschädigten Wächter innerhalb von 3 Sekunden
description.french: Détruire un Sentinel intacte en 3 secondes

description.japanese: 無傷のセンチネルを3秒以内に倒す
description.brazilian: Mate uma Sentinela intacta dentro de 3 segundos.

description.english: Kill a Sentinel by throwing it into Akamoto's Escape Pod
description.german: Töte einen Wächter, indem du ihn in Akamotos Fluchtkapsel schleuderst

description.brazilian: Mate uma Sentinela arremessando-a dentro da Cápsula de Fuga do Akamoto.

description.english: Destroy the Overpowered Sentinel using only grappled missiles
description.german: Zerstöre den überwältigten Wächter, indem du ausschließlich erbeutete Raketen verwendest

description.italian: Distruggi la Sentinella sopraffatta ricorrendo solo a missili agganciati

description.spanish: Destruye el Centinela sobrecargado usando solo misiles enganchados
description.russian: Уничтожить усиленного стража, используя только захваченные ракеты
description.japanese: フックしたミサイルだけを使って、オーバーチャージセンチネルを倒す
description.brazilian: Destrua a Sentinela Poderosa usando apenas mísseis pegos com a garra.

description.english: Rescue Admiral Akamoto within 3'00"

description.french: Sauver l'amiral Akamoto en 3'00" maximum

description.english: Collect 5,000 Salvage in a single Season
description.german: Sammle 5.000 Teile Altmaterial in einer einzigen Phase
description.french: Récupérer 5 000 métaux de recyclage en une seule saison

description.spanish: Rescata 5000 objetos en una sola temporada
description.russian: Собрать 5000 трофеев за один сезон
description.japanese: 1シーズン中に、スクラップを5000集める
description.brazilian: Colete 5.000 Sucatas numa única Temporada.

description.english: Collect every crate in every Mission in a single Season
description.german: Sammle jede Truhe in jeder Mission einer Phase

description.italian: Recupera tutti i forzieri in tutte le missioni di una sola Stagione
description.koreana: 한 시즌에 있는 모든 미션에서 모든 보물 상자 먹기

description.japanese: 1シーズン中に、すべてのコンテナを回収する
description.brazilian: Colete todas as caixas em todas as missões numa única Temporada.

description.english: Kill an enemy with each of the Elemental upgrades in a single Season

description.english: Shatter 25 frozen enemies

description.japanese: 凍結した敵を25体粉砕する
description.brazilian: Estilhace 25 inimigos congelados.

description.english: Kill 3 enemies with a single pierce shot
description.german: Töte 3 Feinde mit einem einzigen Durchdringungsschuss

description.brazilian: Mate 3 inimigos com um único tiro perfurador.

displayName.italian: I miei scudi si sono fusi!

description.english: Kill 3 enemies with a single explosion
description.german: Töte 5 Feinde mit einem einzigen Stück Sprengstoff
description.french: Tuer 5 ennemis en une seule explosion

description.spanish: Acaba con 5 enemigos con un solo explosivo

description.japanese: 1発の爆発攻撃で5体の敵を倒す

description.english: Kill at least 3 enemies with a single spike spore without taking any damage
description.german: Erledige mindestens 3 Feinde mit einer einzigen Stachelspore, ohne jeglichen Schaden zu erleiden

description.italian: Uccidi almeno 3 nemici con una sola Spora chiodata e senza subire danni

description.russian: Убить не менее трех врагов одной шипастой спорой, не получив урона
description.japanese: ダメージを受けることなく、1つのトゲ胞子で3体以上の敵を倒す
description.brazilian: Mate pelo menos 3 inimigos com um único esporo espinhento sem sofrer nenhum dano.

displayName.french: Les bouclier, c'est pour les mauviettes
displayName.italian: Gli scudi sono per le pappamolle!
displayName.japanese: シールドなんて飾りです！

description.english: Deflect 20 shots with the Mech sword within 10 seconds
description.german: Wehre innerhalb von 10 Sekunden 20 Schüsse mit dem Mech-Schwert ab
description.french: Dévier 20 tirs en 10 secondes avec l'épée du mécha
description.italian: Devia 20 colpi con la spada del Mech entro 10 secondi

description.japanese: ソードを使って、10秒以内に20発の敵弾をはじく
description.brazilian: Desvie 20 tiros com a espada do Robô dentro de 10 segundos.

description.english: Shield parry 25 bug attacks
description.german: Pariere mit dem Schild 25 Käferangriffe
description.french: Parer 25 attaques d'insectes avec le bouclier
description.italian: Para 25 attacchi di insetti
description.spanish: Para con el escudo 25 ataques de insectos

description.japanese: バグの攻撃を、シールドで25回はじく
description.brazilian: Defenda-se com o escudo de 25 ataques de inseto.

displayName.italian: È tutto qui quel che sai fare?
displayName.spanish: ¿Eso es todo lo que sabes hacer?

description.english: Shield parry 3 attacks in a row from Uzzerach Nam without taking any damage
description.german: Pariere mit dem Schild 3 Angriffe in Folge von Uzzerach Nam, ohne dabei Schaden zu erleiden
description.french: Parer au bouclier 3 attaques d'affilée de l'Uzzerach Nam sans subir de dégâts
description.italian: Para 3 attacchi consecutivi di Uzzerach Nam senza subire danni
description.koreana: 우제락 남의 공격을 대미지를 받지 않고 실드로 3번 연속 막아내기

description.russian: Отразить щитом три атаки Узрах-Нама подряд, не получив урона

description.brazilian: Defenda-se com o escudo de 3 ataques consecutivos de Uzzerach Nam sem sofrer nenhum dano.

description.english: Feed a grappled enemy to a cave spider
description.german: Verfüttere einen überwältigten Feind an eine Höhlenspinne
description.french: Offrir un ennemi harponné en pâture à une araignée des cavernes
description.italian: Dai un nemico in pasto a un ragno
description.koreana: 그래플 미사일로 잡은 적을 동굴 거미에게 먹이기
description.spanish: Alimenta a la araña de una cueva con un enemigo que hayas enganchado
description.russian: Скормить захваченного врага пещерному пауку
description.japanese: フックしたエネミーをスパイダーに食わせる
description.brazilian: Ofereça um inimigo agarrado como alimento a uma aranha da caverna.

description.english: Fully upgrade both health and shields in a single Season
description.german: Verbessere in einer einzigen Phase Gesundheit und Schilde komplett
description.french: Améliorer au maximum la vie et les boucliers en une seule saison
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo salute e scudi in una sola Stagione
description.koreana: 한 시즌에서 체력과 실드를 완전히 업그레이드하기
description.spanish: Mejora al máximo la vida y los escudos en una temporada
description.russian: Полностью улучшить здоровье и щиты за один сезон
description.japanese: 1シーズン中に、ライフとシールドを最高までアップグレードする
description.brazilian: Melhore ao máximo sua vida e escudos numa única Temporada.

description.english: Complete a Mission without being noticed by the enemies at the warp point
description.german: Schließe eine Mission ab, ohne von den Feinden am Warp-Punkt bemerkt zu werden
description.french: Terminer une mission sans se faire repérer par les ennemis au point de saut
description.italian: Completa una missione senza essere notato dai nemici al portale
description.koreana: 워프 포인트의 적에게 들키지 않고 미션 완료하기

description.russian: Выполнить задание, оставшись незамеченным врагами у точки прыжка

description.english: Kill every enemy in a single Mission in Season 4

description.french: Terminer la saison 4 en tuant tous les ennemis de tous les donjons

description.koreana: 모든 던전의 모든 적을 죽이고 시즌 4 완료하기

description.japanese: シーズン4を、すべてのエリアの敵を全滅させてクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete a Temporada 4 matando todos os inimigos em todas os mapas.

displayName.japanese: ミサイルなど必要ない！

displayName.spanish: Deberías ver cómo ha quedado el otro

description.english: Complete Season 4 without acquiring any upgrades
